# Test: grove add does not auto-lock feature branches
setup_workspace

# Create .grove.toml with auto-lock for main
exec sh -c 'echo "[auto-lock]" > .grove.toml'
exec sh -c 'echo "patterns = [\"main\", \"release/*\"]" >> .grove.toml'

exec grove add feature/autolock-test

# Feature branch should NOT be locked - locking it should succeed
exec grove lock feature-autolock-test --reason 'manual lock'
stderr 'Locked worktree'
